rooms.description: You are on Ho Plaza. Cornell Health is to the southwest. The chimes are playing a concert in the clock tower. Someone tries to hand you a quartercard, but you avoid them.
You are at the entrance to Cornell Health. A sign advertises free flu shots. You briefly wonder how long it would take to get an appointment. Ho Plaza is to the northeast.
You climbed up all 161 steps to the top of McGraw Tower. A Chimesmaster is playing the Jennie McGraw Rag. You feel inspired to ascend higher.
You have reached a higher level of existence.  There are no more words.
